author: akarasulu
msg: Applying patch from Stefan with changes to resolve JIRA issue DIREVE-228 here:
o had to add some code to account for ref/+/* in the ids list
o added creatorsName, createTimestamp, modifiersName, modifyTimestamp
o found and fixed bug where empty attribute list (ids) did not return any
o using a hack (server startup time) to set timestamp values for this fixed
schema configuration - if changes do happen they happen on startup
